price: 3. Rabneeh burta tikki inna waqdi aduurennoo? Toh xer madaara (woh takkem hinna) itte koros.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
